data.title: Fine Arts Center
data.meta_description: Sister Act is the feel-good musical comedy based on the 1992 smash hit film that has audiences jumping to their feet! When disco diva Deloris Van Cartier witnesses a murder, she is […]
data.text:
Details

Run Time

Approximately 2 hours and 30 minutes with one 15 minute intermission.

Show Content

This show contains some mature themes, including situations of violence and a simulated gunshot. However, no nuns were harmed in the making of this musical.

Accessibility Information

American Sign Language interpretation and live audio description are offered during the Saturday, May 10 performance at 5 p.m.

Know before you go

Tickets

Standard Seats & Wednesday PerformancesSelect SeatsPremium Seats$26starting at $56starting at $63

Additional Info

Season Subscriptions

Subscribe to the 2024–25 theatre season for the best prices, plus access to exclusive events and perks. Learn more

Group & Military Discounts

We offer many convenient group sales options with special benefits and savings from 10-25% off single ticket prices, as well as 15% off single ticket prices for military personnel. Call us for more information or to purchase tickets.

FAC Member Tickets

Are you an FAC member? Members receive 15% off on Select and Premium seats. Log in after clicking on ticket button, or purchase by phone or in person to receive your member discount. Not an FAC member? Join today

Student Tickets

Students receive FREE tickets the day of the performance. Tickets subject to availability; must pick up in person at the FAC; CC students must present a CC Gold Card.

CC Faculty & Staff

CC Staff and faculty can purchase rush tickets the day of the performance at the FAC front desk for $30. Tickets subject to availability; must purchase in person and present a CC Gold Card.
